snippet: Some 4 in 10 voters in Colorado, Virginia and Wisconsin say that they do want gun laws to be toughened, new Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls find.
abstract: Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls find roughly 4 in 10 voters in Colorado, Virginia and Wisconsin want gun laws to be toughened; about 6 in 10 voters in Virginia and Wisconsin and two-thirds in Colorado say stricter laws would not deter gunmen intent on mass shootings.
lead_paragraph: Some 4 in 10 voters in Colorado, Virginia and Wisconsin say that they do want gun laws to be toughened, new Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls find.

headline.seo: Polls Find Opposition to Stricter Gun Laws
headline.main: Mixed Views Are Found on Stricter Laws for Guns
headline.print_headline: Mixed Views Are Found On Stricter Laws for Guns
